trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The demogorgon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: 在对任何没有全部命中率的生物进行近战攻击时，妖怪有优势。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: 魔鬼怪在其回合开始时恢复10点命中率。如果食人魔受到酸或火的伤害，这个特性在食人魔的下一回合开始时不会发挥作用。只有在开始回合时命中率为0并且没有再生的情况下，食人魔才会死亡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 迪摩根会进行三次攻击：一次是咬人，两次是用爪子。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3})砍击伤害。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list:

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d8 -1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 蛇头人进行一次大嘴攻击和一次猛烈撕咬。

action.name: Flurry of Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害加上10 ({@damage 4d4})毒药伤害。

action.name: Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})穿刺伤害加上5 ({@damage 1d10})酸液伤害。

action.name: Tail Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled}. As an action, the target can escape the grapple by succeeding on a {@dc 14} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check (its choice). Until this grapple ends, the thessalhydra can't use its tail pincer.

action.name: Acid Saliva {@recharge 5}
entries: 蛇头人向它周围30英尺内可以看到的地方吐出一球酸液。在该点10英尺范围内的每个生物必须做一个{@dc 15}灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到18({@damage 4d8})酸液伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The thessalhydra makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check with advantage.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: 蛇龙做了一个尾部钳形攻击。
